description:
Spike

In Spike, you play as a fragile, cute hedgehog tearing out their spikes to use them as weapons. Spike is a demanding action game in isometric 3D embarking you on a path for revenge.

Key Selling Points
  • Use your own spikes as a weapon
  • Hardcore experience, cute visuals
  • Stop motion inspired animation

Vertical Slice

Spike was developed by a team of 10 students from Cnam-Enjmin. The demo we present here is a vertical slice representing what the whole game would be like.
The demo illustrates a part of the game where the average player has 4 hours of playtime.

Controls

Additional Controls:

  • i : toggle invincible mode
  • 1 : teleport before first closed space encounter
  • 2 : teleport before optional fight
  • 3 : teleport before arena
  • 4 : teleport after arena
  • 5 : teleport before firefly pit
  • 6 : teleport to shop
